key_messages.message: Basecamp makes project management simple and intuitive.
key_messages.context: Most project management systems are overwhelming, inadequate, bewildering, or chaotic. Basecamp aims to simplify this.
TITLE: Basecamp: Project management software, online collaboration

key_messages.message: Born out of the necessity to stop embarrassing ourselves.
key_messages.context: Born out of desperate necessity to stop embarrassing ourselves in front of our clients, the story of how Basecamp was born is likely your story, too.

key_messages.message: Manage everything you need on a single screen with Basecamp.
key_messages.context: Can I see everything I need to do on a single screen? Can I see everything that’s overdue on a single screen?

key_messages.message: Basecamp supports seamless integration with popular apps.
key_messages.context: Can I link up files from Google Docs, Figma, Dropbox, Airtable, and other apps?
